name: SendSMS
doc: Represents any content.. ## Activity of sending short (digital) message from bank to a user or party (typically, but not limited to customer). Typically about important:- task events- case changesThis is one notification and will be sent to all recipients through the same defined channels and the same attached documents.E.g. if there is need to send different attachments, then multiple notifications has to be created. CDM entity name(s): Content,Notification.

type.name: DeliveryTiming
type.doc: Date and time range.At least one of min, max must be defined. If only one is defined, then the other one is automatically +,- infinity. CDM entity name(s): DateTimeRange.

fields.name: max
fields.doc: max, inclusive. CDM attribute class name: DateTimeRangeMax.

fields.name: min
fields.doc: min, inclusive. CDM attribute class name: DateTimeRangeMin.

fields.name: id
fields.doc: ID of the notification. CDM attribute class name: NotificationId.

type.name: NotificationConsumer
type.doc: ConsumerID bude prirazeno pri registraci konzumenta na Sender.

type.name: Phone
type.doc: Phone as a contact on party.. ## Represents telephone number. CDM entity name(s): PhoneContact,PhoneNumber.

fields.name: countryCode
fields.doc:
Country code of the MSISDN. It is 'CC' part of msisdn, see belowBy definition, MSISDN is composed of CC+NDC+SN where
  • CC stands for 'Country Code'
  • NDC stands for 'National Destination Code'
  • SN stands for 'Subscriber Name'
E.g.: 420. CDM attribute class name: PhoneNumberCountryCode.

fields.name: nationalPhoneNumber
fields.doc:
Local part of the MSISDN. It is concatenated 'NDC+SN', see definition below.By definition, MSISDN is composed of CC+NDC+SN where
  • CC stands for 'Country Code'
  • NDC stands for 'National Destination Code'
  • SN stands for 'Subscriber Name'
E.g.: 603123456. CDM attribute class name: PhoneNumberNationalPhoneNumber.

fields.name: processingPriority
fields.doc: Priority of notification that determines order in which notification are sent.e.g. high or standard. CDM attribute class name: NotificationProcessingPriority.

fields.name: text
fields.doc: Content in text format. CDM attribute class name: ContentText.

fields.name: type
fields.doc: Multicodebook attribute type itself. CDM attribute class name: NotificationTypeType. Codebook type: CB_MultiCodebookValue.
